attributes.action: Provide assistance to homeless people during this pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Homeless people are among the most vulnerable in our society and will often have underlying health problems too. They should be provided with a safe space to recover/self-isolate in once suspected to be ill. The government should be proactive in getting out and talking to homeless people about this situation and helping wherever possible
attributes.background: Provide safe spaces for homeless people to receive care and/or medical attention during the coronavirus outbreak.

rejection.details: We think this petition is similar: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302485
